Room.Name: Cypress Grove
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a grove of cypress trees near the edge of the Lithium Inlet.
Room.LongDescription: The trees are old, and moss hangs from them in green tendrils, gently swaying in the breeze. Underneath your feet is a carpet of long dead moss, making it impossible to hear even your own footsteps. The hanging moss makes it difficult to see very far, even though you know the woods are not very deep. There is a cliffside to the south. The walkway continues to the east and west.
